ActionFormat.h

00001 /*
00002  * ActionFormat.h
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 12.08.2010
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  *
00007  *  This special struct is used for now in Galaxy and will hold the actions to perform
00008  *  when certain (sprites) does an action. As there is a location to that action we read it in
00009  *  and extend with member function will get the proper action.
00010  *
00011  *  Special thanks to lemm for his hints!
00012  *
00013  */
00014 
00015 #ifndef ACTIONFORMAT_H_
00016 #define ACTIONFORMAT_H_
00017 
00018 #include <stdint.h>
00019 #include <stdio.h>
00020 #include <string.h>
00021 #include "common/CBehaviorEngine.h"
00022 
00023 struct ActionFormatType {
00024  int16_t Left_sprite;         // 124-400
00025  int16_t Right_sprite;        // 124-400
00026  int16_t Movement_parameter;  // 0-3
00027  int16_t Change_h;            // 0/1
00028  int16_t Change_v;            // 0/1
00029  int16_t Delay;    // (Anim speed)  0-8000
00030  int16_t H_anim_move_amount;  // +- any value
00031  int16_t V_anim_move_amount;  // +- any value
00032  int16_t Behavior;            // [Start of behavior codes only]
00033  int16_t Behavior_segment;    // [Segment values only]
00034  int16_t Check_sprites;       // [Start of check sprite codes only]
00035  int16_t Check_segment;       // [Segment values only]
00036  int16_t Check_tiles;         // [Start of check tile code only]
00037  int16_t Check_segment2;       // [Segment values only]
00038  int16_t Next_action;         // [Valid actions only]
00039 
00040  /**
00041   * \brief get Action Format of the sprite
00042   * \param sprite_offset Offset of the sprite. This is per sprite(object) just one and the same
00043   *        direction
00044   * \param action_number This is the number of action of the sprite.
00045   */
00046  void setActionFormat( size_t sprite_offset )
00047  {
00048   byte *ptr = g_pBehaviorEngine->m_ExeFile.getDSegPtr();
00049   ptr += sprite_offset;
00050   memcpy( this, ptr, 15*sizeof(int16_t) );
00051  }
00052 
00053  /**
00054   * \brief just sets the next action format struct
00055   */
00056  void setNextActionFormat()
00057  {
00058   setActionFormat(Next_action);
00059  }
00060 };
00061 
00062 #endif /* ACTIONFORMAT_H_ */
